data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I see you're having some trouble with your car. It's ____ that ____ issue ____ something ____, ____ example ____ could ____ a ____ in ____ of ____ hoses. Then ____, it's also ____ that ____ issue ____ more ____, ____ there ____ be a mechanical ____ in ____ engine. We really won't know more until I can take a closer look.
data.partBlankContent: I see you're having some trouble with your car. It's poss____ that t__ issue i_ something sim___, f__ example th___ could b_ a le__ in o__ of t__ hoses. Then ag___, it's also poss____ that t__ issue i_ more ser____, li__ there co___ be a mechanical fai____ in t__ engine. We really won't know more until I can take a closer look.
data.answer: 我看你的车出了点问题。也有可能问题很简单，比如其中一根水管里可能有一片树叶。话又说回来，也有可能是更严重的问题，比如可能是发动机的机械故障。在我仔细观察之前，我们真的无法了解更多。
